trans-unit.source: Set up web proxy for a StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Set up web proxy for a StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to configure web proxy settings for your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to configure web proxy settings for your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Configure web proxy for your StorSimple device
trans-unit.target: Configure web proxy for your StorSimple device

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This tutorial describes how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to configure and view web proxy settings for your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial describes how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to configure and view web proxy settings for your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: The web proxy settings are used by the StorSimple device when communicating with the cloud.
trans-unit.target: The web proxy settings are used by the StorSimple device when communicating with the cloud.

trans-unit.source: A web proxy server is used to add another layer of security, filter content, cache to ease bandwidth requirements or even help with analytics.
trans-unit.target: A web proxy server is used to add another layer of security, filter content, cache to ease bandwidth requirements or even help with analytics.

trans-unit.source: Web proxy is an optional configuration for your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Web proxy is an optional configuration for your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: You can configure web proxy only via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.
trans-unit.target: You can configure web proxy only via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.

trans-unit.source: The configuration is a two-step process as follows:
trans-unit.target: The configuration is a two-step process as follows:

trans-unit.source: You first configure web proxy settings through the setup wizard or Windows PowerShell for StorSimple cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: You first configure web proxy settings through the setup wizard or Windows PowerShell for StorSimple cmdlets.

trans-unit.source: You then enable the configured web proxy settings via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: You then enable the configured web proxy settings via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple cmdlets.

trans-unit.source: After the web proxy configuration is complete, you can view the configured web proxy settings in both the Microsoft Azure StorSimple Manager service and the Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.
trans-unit.target: After the web proxy configuration is complete, you can view the configured web proxy settings in both the Microsoft Azure StorSimple Manager service and the Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.

trans-unit.source: After reading this tutorial, you will be able to:
trans-unit.target: After reading this tutorial, you will be able to:

trans-unit.source: Configure web proxy by using setup wizard and cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Configure web proxy by using setup wizard and cmdlets

trans-unit.source: Enable web proxy by using cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Enable web proxy by using cmdlets

trans-unit.source: View web proxy settings in the Management Portal
trans-unit.target: View web proxy settings in the Management Portal

trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot errors during web proxy configuration
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot errors during web proxy configuration

trans-unit.source: Configure web proxy via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple
trans-unit.target: Configure web proxy via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple

trans-unit.source: You use either of the following to configure web proxy settings:
trans-unit.target: You use either of the following to configure web proxy settings:

trans-unit.source: Setup wizard to guide you through the configuration steps.
trans-unit.target: Setup wizard to guide you through the configuration steps.

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets in Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.
trans-unit.target: Cmdlets in Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.

trans-unit.source: Each of these methods are discussed in the following sections.
trans-unit.target: Each of these methods are discussed in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: Configure web proxy via the setup wizard
trans-unit.target: Configure web proxy via the setup wizard

trans-unit.source: You can use the setup wizard to guide you through the steps for web proxy configuration.
trans-unit.target: You can use the setup wizard to guide you through the steps for web proxy configuration.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to configure web proxy on your device.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to configure web proxy on your device.

trans-unit.source: To configure web proxy via the setup wizard
trans-unit.target: To configure web proxy via the setup wizard

trans-unit.source: In the serial console menu, choose option 1, **Log in with full access** and provide the **device administrator password**.
trans-unit.target: In the serial console menu, choose option 1, **Log in with full access** and provide the **device administrator password**.

trans-unit.source: Type the following command to start a setup wizard session:
trans-unit.target: Type the following command to start a setup wizard session:

trans-unit.source: If this is the first time that you have used the setup wizard for device registration, you will need to configure all the required network settings until you reach the web proxy configuration.
trans-unit.target: If this is the first time that you have used the setup wizard for device registration, you will need to configure all the required network settings until you reach the web proxy configuration.

trans-unit.source: If your device is already registered, you can accept all the configured network settings until you reach the web proxy configuration.In the setup wizard, when prompted to configure web proxy settings, type **Yes**.
trans-unit.target: If your device is already registered, you can accept all the configured network settings until you reach the web proxy configuration.In the setup wizard, when prompted to configure web proxy settings, type **Yes**.

trans-unit.source: For the **Web Proxy URL**, specify the IP address or the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of your web proxy server and the TCP port number that you would like your device to use when communicating with the cloud.
trans-unit.target: For the **Web Proxy URL**, specify the IP address or the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of your web proxy server and the TCP port number that you would like your device to use when communicating with the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Use the following format:
trans-unit.target: Use the following format:

trans-unit.source: By default, TCP port number 8080 is specified.
trans-unit.target: By default, TCP port number 8080 is specified.

trans-unit.source: Choose the authentication type as **NTLM**, **Basic**, or **None**.
trans-unit.target: Choose the authentication type as **NTLM**, **Basic**, or **None**.

trans-unit.source: Basic is the least secure authentication for the proxy server configuration.
trans-unit.target: Basic is the least secure authentication for the proxy server configuration.

trans-unit.source: NT LAN Manager (NTLM) is a highly secure and complex authentication protocol that uses a three-way messaging system (sometimes four if additional integrity is required) to authenticate a user.
trans-unit.target: NT LAN Manager (NTLM) is a highly secure and complex authentication protocol that uses a three-way messaging system (sometimes four if additional integrity is required) to authenticate a user.

trans-unit.source: The default authentication is NTLM.
trans-unit.target: The default authentication is NTLM.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Basic](http://hc.apache.org/httpclient-3.x/authentication.html) and [NTLM authentication](http://hc.apache.org/httpclient-3.x/authentication.html).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Basic](http://hc.apache.org/httpclient-3.x/authentication.html) and [NTLM authentication](http://hc.apache.org/httpclient-3.x/authentication.html).

trans-unit.source: In the StorSimple Manager service, the device monitoring charts do not work when Basic or NTLM authentication is enabled in the proxy server configuration for the device.
trans-unit.target: In the StorSimple Manager service, the device monitoring charts do not work when Basic or NTLM authentication is enabled in the proxy server configuration for the device.

trans-unit.source: For the monitoring charts to work, you will need to ensure that authentication is set to NONE.
trans-unit.target: For the monitoring charts to work, you will need to ensure that authentication is set to NONE.

trans-unit.source: If you are using authentication, supply a **Web Proxy Username** and a **Web Proxy Password**.
trans-unit.target: If you are using authentication, supply a **Web Proxy Username** and a **Web Proxy Password**.

trans-unit.source: You will also need to confirm the password.
trans-unit.target: You will also need to confirm the password.

trans-unit.source: Configure Web Proxy On StorSimple Device1
trans-unit.target: Configure Web Proxy On StorSimple Device1

trans-unit.source: If you are registering your device for the first time, continue with the registration.
trans-unit.target: If you are registering your device for the first time, continue with the registration.

trans-unit.source: If your device was already registered, the wizard will exit.
trans-unit.target: If your device was already registered, the wizard will exit.

trans-unit.source: The configured settings will be saved.
trans-unit.target: The configured settings will be saved.

trans-unit.source: Web proxy will now also be enabled.
trans-unit.target: Web proxy will now also be enabled.

trans-unit.source: You can skip the [Enable web proxy](#enable-web-proxy) step and go directly to [View the web proxy settings in the Management Portal](#view-web-proxy-settings-in-the-management-portal).
trans-unit.target: You can skip the [Enable web proxy](#enable-web-proxy) step and go directly to [View the web proxy settings in the Management Portal](#view-web-proxy-settings-in-the-management-portal).

trans-unit.source: Configure web proxy via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Configure web proxy via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple cmdlets

trans-unit.source: An alternate way to configure web proxy settings is via the Windows PowerShell for StorSimple cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: An alternate way to configure web proxy settings is via the Windows PowerShell for StorSimple cmdlets.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to configure web proxy.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to configure web proxy.

trans-unit.source: To configure web proxy via cmdlets
trans-unit.target: To configure web proxy via cmdlets

trans-unit.source: In the serial console menu, choose option 1, **Log in with full access**.
trans-unit.target: In the serial console menu, choose option 1, **Log in with full access**.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, provide the **device administrator password**.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, provide the **device administrator password**.

trans-unit.source: The default password is `Password1`.
trans-unit.target: The default password is `Password1`.

trans-unit.source: At the command prompt, type:
trans-unit.target: At the command prompt, type:

trans-unit.source: Provide and confirm the password when prompted, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: Provide and confirm the password when prompted, as shown below.

trans-unit.source: Configure Web Proxy On StorSimple Device3
trans-unit.target: Configure Web Proxy On StorSimple Device3

trans-unit.source: The web proxy is now configured and needs to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: The web proxy is now configured and needs to be enabled.

trans-unit.source: Enable web proxy
trans-unit.target: Enable web proxy

trans-unit.source: Web proxy is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Web proxy is disabled by default.

trans-unit.source: After you configure the web proxy settings on your StorSimple device, you need to use the Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to enable the web proxy settings.
trans-unit.target: After you configure the web proxy settings on your StorSimple device, you need to use the Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to enable the web proxy settings.

trans-unit.source: This step will not be required if you used the setup wizard to configure web proxy.
trans-unit.target: This step will not be required if you used the setup wizard to configure web proxy.

trans-unit.source: Web proxy is automatically enabled by default after a setup wizard session.
trans-unit.target: Web proxy is automatically enabled by default after a setup wizard session.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps in Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to enable web proxy on your device:
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps in Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to enable web proxy on your device:

trans-unit.source: To enable web proxy
trans-unit.target: To enable web proxy

trans-unit.source: In the serial console menu, choose option 1, **Log in with full access**.
trans-unit.target: In the serial console menu, choose option 1, **Log in with full access**.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, provide the **device administrator password**.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, provide the **device administrator password**.

trans-unit.source: The default password is `Password1`.
trans-unit.target: The default password is `Password1`.

trans-unit.source: At the command prompt, type:
trans-unit.target: At the command prompt, type:

trans-unit.source: You have now enabled the web proxy configuration on your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: You have now enabled the web proxy configuration on your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Configure Web Proxy On StorSimple Device4
trans-unit.target: Configure Web Proxy On StorSimple Device4

trans-unit.source: View web proxy settings in the Management Portal
trans-unit.target: View web proxy settings in the Management Portal

trans-unit.source: The web proxy settings are configured through the Windows PowerShell interface and cannot be changed from within the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: The web proxy settings are configured through the Windows PowerShell interface and cannot be changed from within the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: You can, however, view these configured settings in the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: You can, however, view these configured settings in the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to view web proxy.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to view web proxy.

trans-unit.source: To view web proxy settings
trans-unit.target: To view web proxy settings

trans-unit.source: Navigate to **StorSimple Manager service > Devices**.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to **StorSimple Manager service > Devices**.

trans-unit.source: Select and click a device and then go to **Configure**.
trans-unit.target: Select and click a device and then go to **Configure**.

trans-unit.source: Scroll down on the **Configure** page to **Web proxy settings** section.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down on the **Configure** page to **Web proxy settings** section.

trans-unit.source: You can view the configured web proxy settings on your StorSimple device as shown below.
trans-unit.target: You can view the configured web proxy settings on your StorSimple device as shown below.

trans-unit.source: View Web Proxy in Management Portal
trans-unit.target: View Web Proxy in Management Portal

trans-unit.source: Errors during web proxy configuration
trans-unit.target: Errors during web proxy configuration

trans-unit.source: If the web proxy settings have been configured incorrectly, error messages will be displayed to the user in Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.
trans-unit.target: If the web proxy settings have been configured incorrectly, error messages will be displayed to the user in Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.

trans-unit.source: The following table explains some of these error messages, their probable causes, and recommended actions.
trans-unit.target: The following table explains some of these error messages, their probable causes, and recommended actions.

trans-unit.source: Serial no.
trans-unit.target: Serial no.

trans-unit.source: HRESULT error Code
trans-unit.target: HRESULT error Code

trans-unit.source: Possible root cause
trans-unit.target: Possible root cause

trans-unit.source: Recommended action
trans-unit.target: Recommended action

trans-unit.source: Command is run from the passive controller and it is not able to communicate with the active controller.
trans-unit.target: Command is run from the passive controller and it is not able to communicate with the active controller.

trans-unit.source: Run the command on the active controller.
trans-unit.target: Run the command on the active controller.

trans-unit.source: To run the command from the passive controller, you will need to fix the connectivity from passive to active controller.
trans-unit.target: To run the command from the passive controller, you will need to fix the connectivity from passive to active controller.

trans-unit.source: You will need to engage Microsoft Support if this connectivity is broken.
trans-unit.target: You will need to engage Microsoft Support if this connectivity is broken.

trans-unit.source: 0x800710dd - The operation identifier is not valid
trans-unit.target: 0x800710dd - The operation identifier is not valid

trans-unit.source: Proxy settings are not supported on StorSimple virtual device.
trans-unit.target: Proxy settings are not supported on StorSimple virtual device.

trans-unit.source: Proxy settings are not supported on StorSimple virtual device.
trans-unit.target: Proxy settings are not supported on StorSimple virtual device.

trans-unit.source: These can only be configured on a StorSimple physical device.
trans-unit.target: These can only be configured on a StorSimple physical device.

trans-unit.source: 0x80070057 - Invalid parameter
trans-unit.target: 0x80070057 - Invalid parameter

trans-unit.source: One of the parameters provided for the proxy settings is not valid.
trans-unit.target: One of the parameters provided for the proxy settings is not valid.

trans-unit.source: The URI is not provided in correct format.
trans-unit.target: The URI is not provided in correct format.

trans-unit.source: Use the following format: `http://<IP address or FQDN of the web proxy server>:<TCP port number>`
trans-unit.target: Use the following format: `http://<IP address or FQDN of the web proxy server>:<TCP port number>`

trans-unit.source: 0x800706ba - RPC server not available
trans-unit.target: 0x800706ba - RPC server not available

trans-unit.source: The root cause is one of the following:
trans-unit.target: The root cause is one of the following:

trans-unit.source: Cluster is not up.
trans-unit.target: Cluster is not up.

trans-unit.source: Datapath service is not running.
trans-unit.target: Datapath service is not running.

trans-unit.source: The command is run from passive controller and it is not able to communicate with the active controller.
trans-unit.target: The command is run from passive controller and it is not able to communicate with the active controller.

trans-unit.source: Please engage Microsoft Support to ensure that the cluster is up and datapath service is running.
trans-unit.target: Please engage Microsoft Support to ensure that the cluster is up and datapath service is running.

trans-unit.source: Run the command from the active controller.
trans-unit.target: Run the command from the active controller.

trans-unit.source: If you want to run the command from the passive controller, you will need to ensure the passive controller can communicate with the active controller.
trans-unit.target: If you want to run the command from the passive controller, you will need to ensure the passive controller can communicate with the active controller.

trans-unit.source: You will need to engage Microsoft Support if this connectivity is broken.
trans-unit.target: You will need to engage Microsoft Support if this connectivity is broken.

trans-unit.source: 0x800706be - RPC call failed
trans-unit.target: 0x800706be - RPC call failed

trans-unit.source: Cluster is down.
trans-unit.target: Cluster is down.

trans-unit.source: Please engage Microsoft Support to ensure that the cluster is up.
trans-unit.target: Please engage Microsoft Support to ensure that the cluster is up.

trans-unit.source: 0x8007138f - Cluster resource not found
trans-unit.target: 0x8007138f - Cluster resource not found

trans-unit.source: Platform service cluster resource is not found.
trans-unit.target: Platform service cluster resource is not found.

trans-unit.source: This can happen when the installation was not proper.
trans-unit.target: This can happen when the installation was not proper.

trans-unit.source: You may need to perform a factory reset on your device.You may need to create a platform resource.
trans-unit.target: You may need to perform a factory reset on your device.You may need to create a platform resource.

trans-unit.source: Please contact Microsoft Support for next steps.
trans-unit.target: Please contact Microsoft Support for next steps.

trans-unit.source: 0x8007138c - Cluster resource not online
trans-unit.target: 0x8007138c - Cluster resource not online

trans-unit.source: Platform or datapath cluster resources are not online.
trans-unit.target: Platform or datapath cluster resources are not online.

trans-unit.source: Please contact Microsoft Support to help ensure that the datapath and platform service resource are online.
trans-unit.target: Please contact Microsoft Support to help ensure that the datapath and platform service resource are online.

trans-unit.source: The above list of error messages is not exhaustive.
trans-unit.target: The above list of error messages is not exhaustive.

trans-unit.source: Errors related to web proxy settings will not be displayed in the Management Portal in your StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: Errors related to web proxy settings will not be displayed in the Management Portal in your StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: If there is an issue with web proxy after the configuration is completed, the device status will change to **Offline** in the Management Portal.|
trans-unit.target: If there is an issue with web proxy after the configuration is completed, the device status will change to **Offline** in the Management Portal.|

trans-unit.source: Next Steps
trans-unit.target: Next Steps

trans-unit.source: If you experience any issues while deploying your device or configuring web proxy settings, refer to [Troubleshoot your StorSimple device deployment](storsimple-troubleshoot-deployment.md).
trans-unit.target: If you experience any issues while deploying your device or configuring web proxy settings, refer to [Troubleshoot your StorSimple device deployment](storsimple-troubleshoot-deployment.md).
